purpose: Monitor newly published scientific and medical literature that highlights opportunities and risks relevant to Palatin's ongoing research programs in melanocortin pathway therapeutics. This stream informs research direction, study design, and competitive landscape awareness across obesity, ocular disease, gastrointestinal/renal disease, and sexual dysfunction indications.

channels.name: Melanocortin Pathway Research
channels.focus: Track fundamental scientific research on melanocortin receptors (MCR1, MCR4, MCR5) and pathway mechanisms relevant to therapeutic development

channels.name: Obesity & Metabolic Disease
channels.focus: Monitor scientific literature on melanocortin pathways in obesity, binge eating, and metabolic disease, including competitive developments

channels.name: Ocular Disease Research
channels.focus: Track research on melanocortin pathways in ocular indications including dry eye disease, glaucoma, and retinal diseases

channels.name: Gastroenterology & Renal Disease
channels.focus: Monitor scientific literature on melanocortin pathways in gastrointestinal and renal indications

channels.name: Sexual Dysfunction (Secondary)
channels.focus: Monitor developments in melanocortin pathways for sexual dysfunction, particularly as they relate to Vyleesi (bremelanotide) milestone payments and retained rights for other indications

channel_queries.query_expression: melanocortin OR MCR1 OR MCR4 OR MCR5 OR "alpha-MSH" OR "melanocyte stimulating hormone" OR "melanocortin receptor" OR "melanocortin pathway" OR "MC1R agonist" OR "MC4R agonist"
obesity OR "binge eating" OR "metabolic disease" OR "bremelanotide obesity" OR "GLP-1 adjuvant" OR "MCR4 agonist obesity" OR PL7737 OR "MC4R agonist peptide" OR "weight loss melanocortin"
"dry eye disease" OR DED OR glaucoma OR "retinal disease" OR "ocular inflammation" OR PL9643 OR PL9588 OR PL9654 OR "melanocortin ocular" OR "MCR agonist eye"
"ulcerative colitis" OR UC OR "diabetic nephropathy" OR PL8177 OR "MC1R agonist" OR "melanocortin gastrointestinal" OR "melanocortin renal" OR "inflammatory bowel disease melanocortin"
"female sexual dysfunction" OR HSDD OR "hypoactive sexual desire disorder" OR bremelanotide OR Vyleesi OR "male erectile dysfunction" OR "melanocortin sexual function"
obesity melanocortin | "binge eating" MCR4 | PL7737 | "GLP-1 adjuvant"
"dry eye" melanocortin | glaucoma MCR | PL9643 | PL9588

relevance_scoring.criteria: Relevance to Palatin's ongoing research programs and business goals

evidence_hierarchy_scoring.criteria: Scientific rigor based on evidence hierarchy (systematic reviews, RCTs, observational studies, etc.)

scoring_config.notes: Integrated score = (Relevance * 0.6) + (Evidence Hierarchy * 0.4). Articles with integrated score >= 7.0 are included in weekly alert.

metadata.competitive_context: Monitor competitive developments in melanocortin pathway research, particularly GLP-1 combination therapies and novel MCR4 agonists
business_objectives: Inform research direction and study design
